roleset.name: to come into conflict, be in opposition

role.descr: agentive clasher, first clasher, or all clashers in one constituent
entity clashed with when separate constituent

example.name: Arg 1 as "with" PP
example.text: Both executives left the company after clashes with Chairman Ralph Ingersoll Jr .

example.name: NP only, Arg0, both clashers in single constituent
example.text: such a clash of corporate titans

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry clash.01, OntoNotes grouping clash-n senses 2 & 4; maps to VerbNet classes battle-36.4-1, bump-18.4-1, sound_emission-43.2. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Arg2, LOC & MNR
example.text: There was a bitter clash in the senate over the proposed health care bill.
example.arg: over the proposed health care bill

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Remember her clash with the bishops over the condom issue?

roleset.name: (cause to) hit against with clashing noise, or cause discord between two non-agentive things

roles.note: This roleset can *almost* be included with .01, except for usages like "he clashed the symbol against the other," where we have an agent and two clasher constituents...Plus this sense will never have a "topic" argument.

role.descr: thing made to clash, hit against something else, or both things clashing in one constituent

roleset.note: Roleset based on OntoNotes grouping senses 1 & 3, no equivalent PB verb entry; maps to VN classes bump-18.4-1, sound_emission-43.2. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Arg1, both clashers in one mention
example.text: The clash of the symbols could be heard above the rest of the orchestra.

example.name: New semantics, Arg1 as one PP again
example.text: The clash between John's plaid pants and paisley shirt was unflattering.
example.arg: between John's plaid pants and paisley shirt

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: The clash of steel against shield, crackling magics cast by wizards, arcane Dwarven technology, sinister Skaven, and many more!
